attributes.action: increase the 40p per mile allowance for care workers that use thier own transport to visit patients
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Health Care Workers who use their own vehicles to visit & treat elderly and disabled people in their own homes that require health care, are being overlooked of by this Government. A tax exempt mileage allowance of 40p a mile was fair in 2002 but with the recent steep increase in fuel charges is now quite unreasonable. More must be done to recognise and support the excellent work being done by this valuable group of people.
